title: Iona Italia: IDW, Discourse and Dance
description:
I speak with Iona Italia on the Intellectual Dark Web as a group of people, opposed to a way of doing dialogue. She gives her thoughts on Uri Harris's articles in Quillette critiquing the IDW, and suggests that it could be helpful for the group to include someone further to the left, such a Ezra Klein We also speak about her latest book "Our Tango World" on Argentine Tango

Podcast version: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Iona-Italia-IDW--Discourse-and-Dance-e4254f
Dance clip: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=10&v=CbVRHs7q8eY

Follow her on twitter @IonaItalia

Follow me here:

twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
